channel.title: Rust on hack(pravj)
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on hack(pravj)

item.title: Armin on Rust
item.description: I’ve been trying out Rust for some time and have been totally loving it so far. Glad to see that Armin Ronacher, one of the programmers I highly respect feels the same! Rust is inspiring for many reasons. The biggest reason I like it is because it’s practical. I tried Haskell, I tried Erlang and neither of those languages spoke “I am a practical language” to me. I know there are many programmers that adore them, but they are not for me.
